parameters.name: q
parameters.value: subject:(é ˜åæ›¸ OR receipt OR æ³¨æ–‡ç¢ºå®š OR order confirmation) newer_than:7d

parameters.query: INSERT INTO receipts (receipt_type, transaction_date, amount, currency, counterparty_name, source_type, source_email_id, description, search_text, match_status) VALUES ($1, $2::date, $3, $4, $5, $6, $7, $8, $9, 'unmatched') ON CONFLICT DO NOTHING RETURNING id

INSERT INTO receipts (receipt_type, transaction_date, amount, currency, counterparty_name, description, file_url, source_type, search_text, match_status) VALUES ($1, $2::date, $3, $4, $5, $6, $7, $8, $9, 'unmatched') RETURNING id

SELECT r.id as receipt_id, r.amount, r.counterparty_name, r.transaction_date, pc.id as cart_id, pc.source_price_jpy, pc.source_platform, ABS(r.amount - pc.source_price_jpy) as amount_diff FROM receipts r CROSS JOIN purchase_carts pc WHERE r.match_status = 'unmatched' AND pc.cart_status = 'purchased' AND ABS(r.amount - pc.source_price_jpy) < 500 AND ABS(r.transaction_date - pc.purchased_at::date) <= 3 ORDER BY amount_diff ASC LIMIT 50
UPDATE receipts SET purchase_cart_id = $1::uuid, match_status = 'auto_matched', match_confidence = $2, matched_at = NOW() WHERE id = $3::uuid AND match_status = 'unmatched' RETURNING id
SELECT * FROM receipts WHERE match_status = 'unmatched' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 50
